page.title: 10LLWYNYPIA HOSPITAL
page.content: The hospital opened in the early 1900's and the Out-Patients Department opened in 1935. The hospital consists of the following departments: Ear, Nose and Throat, Paediatrics,Geriatric ,Medical and Surgical. Other depart- ments include Speech Therapy,Chiropody ,Child Welfare,X-Ray, Mammography and Scanning Unit. The number of beds available are as follows: Acute Geriatric 60, Long stay Geriatric 26, Surgical and Orthopaedic 76, Maternity 20 and Medical 56. The cutbacks in Health Service spending are causing great pressures on the system and there is great public concern over proposed further cutback in essential services.
